text: Ohh thatd be cool to check out if i go to nyc soon. My bro lives there anyway and we crash at his place for concerts! But outer NYC (Flushing technically )has Teso-x which is pretty sick as well!

author: debbiefr.bsky.social
text:
Yes, and hot chocolate!!  Maybe even hot cider???  

Ok, now you all are making me “home” sick for Christmas in NYC!!!!  Dad + family were from Brooklyn and have family members in NYC, Long Island + Queens.  Love flying in, seeing the skyline and feeling like I’m home again.

author: hubbub.bsky.social
text:
Northeast Weekly Update – December 2

📈≈ COVID prevalence will be increasing in MA in the week ahead while stabilizing in rest of the the Northeast, after significant increases in CT, NYC, NJ & PA over the past week

✨ This holiday season – Get bub. Not sick.
